citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs was not available for review during this inspections. A total of 40 adult guinea pigs, 30
weanlings and 20 newborns were counted during this inspection. There were not in inventory records kept for guinea pigs
for several months. Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by identifying
animal losses by death or decreased number of animals born, raised, or sold. The licensee must maintain records
containing the required information for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired or
disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by November 13, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs was not available for review during this inspections. A total of 40 adult guinea pigs, 30 
weanlings and 20 newborns were counted during this inspection. There were not in inventory records kept for guinea pigs 
for several months. Failure to maintain these records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by identifying 
animal losses by death or decreased number of animals born, raised, or sold. The licensee must maintain records 
containing the required information for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired or 
disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by November 13, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
